name: Core_FillMode
description: The fill mode determines if a primitive is rasterized as a solid, as lines, or as points.

elements.name: Core_FillMode_Solid
elements.description: Fill mode in which polygons are rasterized as solids.

elements.name: Core_FillMode_Lines
elements.description: Fill mode in which polygons are rasterized as lines.

elements.name: Core_FillMode_Point
elements.description: Fill mode in which polygons are rasterized as points.
